summary: 2001 CHEV. TAHOE. THE GASOLINE EVAPORATIVE CANISTER VENT VALVE DRAWS IN DIRT AND CLOGS THE VALVE AND THE EVAPORATIVE CANISTER WHEN DRIVEN ON DIRT ROADS. THIS HAS BEEN ADDRESSED FOR 1999 TO 2002 PICKUPS WITH A NEW VALVE DESIGN THAT IMPROVES FILTERING AND ALLOWS EASIER CLEANING OF THE FILTER. (BULLETIN 02-06-04-037). *JB
